verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
My soul magnifies the Lord,
My spirit rejoices in God my Saviour,
My soul magnifies the Lord,
My spirit rejoices in my God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For He has regarded the lowly estate of His handmaid,
Behold, henceforth all ages will call me blessed,
For He who is mighty has done great things for me.
Holy His Name!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And His mercy is on those who fear Him thru' ages.
He has shown strength with His arm,
And the proud He has scattered.
The mighty He put down the lowly have been exalted.
Holy His Name!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
The hungry He has filled the rich sent empty away.
Israel He has helped remembering His mercy.
His promise to Abraham and our fathers forever.
Holy His Name!
